name: part_009
file: tmp_【＃癒月ちょこ誕生日LIVE】重大告知あり？！3Dお誕生日ライブ！【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [uHtWZbAu7iE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Yuzuki Choco performs the ballad 'Tsukimisou' on stage with a visual of her on the screen behind her.
Choco talks to the audience after her performance and announces her new birthday merchandise.

subtitles.original: 忘れたいのに 今更素直になれない
subtitles.english: Although I want to forget, I can't be honest now.

subtitles.original: 分かってたんだよ
subtitles.english: I knew it.

subtitles.original: 今も心は泣いてるよ
subtitles.english: Even now, my heart is crying.

subtitles.original: 季節を越えて
subtitles.english: Beyond the seasons,

subtitles.original: あなたはまた
subtitles.english: you again

subtitles.original: 世界を奪っていく
subtitles.english: take away my world.

subtitles.original: 感じる温もりが
subtitles.english: The warmth I feel

subtitles.original: そっと私の未来も
subtitles.english: gently takes away my future too.

subtitles.original: 奪う
subtitles.english: Takes it away.

subtitles.original: 時計の針は
subtitles.english: The clock hands

subtitles.original: 突然止まる
subtitles.english: suddenly stop

subtitles.original: あなたが告げた言葉で
subtitles.english: at the words you told me.

subtitles.original: どうしてここで一人なんだろう
subtitles.english: Why am I alone here?

subtitles.original: 流した涙の意味を
subtitles.english: The meaning of the tears I shed,

subtitles.original: ねえ教えてよ
subtitles.english: hey, tell me.

subtitles.original: 二人でいたこの道歩いても
subtitles.english: Even if I walk this path where we were together,

subtitles.original: もう二度とあなたのこと
subtitles.english: I will never

subtitles.original: 思い出しはしない
subtitles.english: think of you again.

subtitles.original: 忘れるように 愛した証を脱ぎ捨てて
subtitles.english: Casting aside the proof of my love to forget,

subtitles.original: また新しい日々へと歩き出す
subtitles.english: I'll start walking into new days again.

subtitles.original: 細かく破れた手紙を
subtitles.english: The finely torn letter...

subtitles.original: 結んだ髪をほどいて
subtitles.english: Unbinding my tied-up hair,

subtitles.original: 悲しみから解き放つために叫んだ
subtitles.english: I screamed to set myself free from sadness.

subtitles.original: 優しくなれる心が欲しいよ
subtitles.english: I want a heart that can become kind.

subtitles.original: 凍えそうだよ 寂しさ嘆いても
subtitles.english: I feel like I'm freezing, even if I lament the loneliness.

subtitles.original: 大好きで大嫌いなあなたはもういない
subtitles.english: You, whom I love and hate so much, are no longer here.

subtitles.original: 巻き戻してあの日に戻れるのならば
subtitles.english: If I could rewind and go back to that day,

subtitles.original: 伝えたいけど今も遅いかな
subtitles.english: I'd want to tell you, but is it too late now?

subtitles.original: 赤色のこの街眺めては
subtitles.english: Looking at this crimson town,

subtitles.original: こんなにもあなたのこと 思い出してばかり
subtitles.english: I'm only thinking about you this much.

subtitles.original: 忘れたいのに 今更素直になれない
subtitles.english: Although I want to forget, I can't be honest now.

subtitles.original: 分かってたんだよ
subtitles.english: I knew it.

subtitles.original: ずっとあなたを求めてた
subtitles.english: I've been searching for you all along.

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、月見草でしたー！
subtitles.english: Yes! So that was "Tsukimisou"!

subtitles.original: いや、実はちょこ、初めて3D配信でバラード歌っちゃって、
subtitles.english: Actually, it's Choco's first time singing a ballad in a 3D stream,

subtitles.original: ちょっと内心めちゃくちゃなんかドキドキしてるんだけど、
subtitles.english: so deep down I'm really nervous, but,

subtitles.original: ねえどうだった？どうだったー？
subtitles.english: hey, how was it? How was it?

subtitles.original: ちょっと恥ずかしい。
subtitles.english: It's a bit embarrassing.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！んー、優しい。好き！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Mm, you're so kind. I love you!

subtitles.original: ということで、ここで重大告知がありまーす！
subtitles.english: So, I have a major announcement here!

subtitles.original: まず一つ目！
subtitles.english: First one!

subtitles.original: なななななんと！
subtitles.english: Wh-wh-wh-what?!

subtitles.original: 癒月ちょこ誕生日記念グッズがこの後21時から発売開始されまーす！
subtitles.english: Yuzuki Choco birthday commemorative goods will go on sale from 9 PM after this!

subtitles.original: 今回のグッズはこちら！
subtitles.english: Here are the goods for this time!

subtitles.original: ダダダダーン！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: まず一つ目は、皆様お待たせいたしました！
subtitles.english: First, the one you've all been waiting for!

subtitles.original: Nardack先生描き下ろし、癒月ちょこ抱き枕カバー！
subtitles.english: Illustrated by Nardack-sensei, the Yuzuki Choco Dakimakura Cover!

subtitles.original: いや、こちらね、なんと両面ございまして、
subtitles.english: This one, actually, is double-sided,
